From: robertdahl <rdahl@...>

Three Vehicles arrive at the secret Autobot hanger. A Van, Lamburgini,
and tow truck stop in front, the Van transforming into Ironhide, as he
points at the entrance. "What's going on here? Hoist, move that ruble."
He commands. Immediately the tow truck moves up to the pile of rocks.
THe yellow part on the back off the tow truck lifts up, and two rods
extend themselves, ski like apparatus' attached. They then get under the
ruble and begin moving rock by rock until the pile lestenes. Ironhide
looks at it confidently. "Be on extreem caution Sunstreaker, who knows
what cause this cave in, the Predacons may be on to us."
